articles.title: Most Asian Americans are against the recall, but some haven't forgiven Newsom for his nail salon remark - Los Angeles Times
articles.description: “It’s simple. He cost us our livelihood,” said Phuoc Dam, a Vietnamese American nail salon owner.
articles.content:
Phuoc Dam has not forgiven Gov. Gavin Newsom for alleging that the first coronavirus case in California stemmed from a nail salon.
